name: Egg Defense Force
description:
Egg Defense Force is an arcade game where you defend an egg from incoming meteors by linking your squad and intercepting the threats! How far can you survive?

Screenshots

Credits

Game developed for Mark Brown's GMTK Game Jam 2021 by azure2s.

Concept: Thomas Tiam-Lee

Developer: Thomas Tiam-Lee
